variable.name: BCRALIQUOTBARCODE
variable.description: Aliquot of an analyte extracted from a portion of a sample

variable.name: A260A280RATIO
variable.description: Ratio of absorbance at 260nm to absorbance at 280nm of analyte extracted from a sample portion

variable.name: GELIMAGEFILE
variable.description: The name of the file containing the gel image of the analyte

variable.name: INTERMEDIATEDIMENSION
variable.description: The second longest dimension, in cm, of the tumor

variable.name: LONGESTDIMENSION
variable.description: The longest dimension, in cm, of the tumor

variable.name: NORMALTUMORGENOTYPEMATCH
variable.description: Did the tumor and normal tissue genotypes agree

variable.name: PCRAMPLIFICATIONSUCCESSFUL
variable.description: Did the PCR reaction amplify the correct bands

variable.name: RATIO28S18S
variable.description: Ratio of intensity of the 28S and 18S rRNA bands

variable.name: RINVALUE
variable.description: RNA integrity number from Agilent bioanalyzer

variable.name: SHIPPINGDATE
variable.description: The day on which the aliquot was shipped to the sequencing or characterization center for analysis

variable.name: SHORTESTDIMENSION
variable.description: The shortest dimension, in cm, of the tumor

variable.name: TYPE
variable.description: Type of analyte extracted from sample portion

variable.name: VERIFICATIONBYBCR
variable.description: Indicates if the pathology determination from the tissue center agrees with that of the BCR

variable.name: WEIGHT
variable.description: The weight of the portion taken from the tissue sample
